name: Star Catcher (itch) (Zhuoran_Ma)
description:
Wanna make a wish? Why not talk to stars!

Star Catcher is a multiplayer game in which each player competes with other, aiming to catch and collect as many stars as possible. When you finish the game, take your time and make a wish!

Game Instruction:
  • Press LEFT and RIGHT arrow to control the direction of the star catcher
  • Press UP arrow to catch stars
  • Click your mouse to move the bottle to collect your stars
  • The smaller the star you collect, the more you score
  • The player who catches most star is the winner
Citation:

Bakse, J. (2020). p5.party [Computer software]. https://github.com/jbakse/p5.party
